주제별 단어 — 건축 (Topic: Architecture).example_en: The skyline of Gangnam has completely changed from ten years ago.
주제별 단어 — 건축 (Topic: Architecture).notes: Loanword from English 'skyline'. Collocates with: 변하다, 독특하다, 아름답다. Urban symbol; architectural identity of a city.

주제별 단어 — 건축 (Topic: Architecture).example: 도시 재생 사업을 통해 쇠퇴한 구도심에 활력을 불어넣고 있다.
주제별 단어 — 건축 (Topic: Architecture).example_en: Urban regeneration projects are breathing new life into declining old city centers.
주제별 단어 — 건축 (Topic: Architecture).notes: Sino-Korean: 都市 (city) + 再生 (regeneration). Broader than 재개발; includes cultural, social renewal. Collocates with: 사업, 활성화.
